maintenanceMode.title: Maintenance mode
maintenanceMode.label: Enable/disable maintenance mode
maintenanceMode.info: When maintenance mode is activated, all incoming deal proposals (storage and retrieval) are rejected.

unknownClient.title: Unknown clients
unknownClient.label: Accept storage deals from unknown clients
unknownClient.info: When deactivated, all storage deals from unknown clients are rejected

startEpochSealingBuffer.title: Start epoch sealing buffer
startEpochSealingBuffer.tooltip: Minimum start epoch buffer to give time for sealing of sector with deal, any deals below that time, will be rejected. Value expressed in HOURS.

connector.title: CIDgravity connector
connector.info:
The "CIDgravity connector" connects a miner to the CIDgravity
platform. This lightweight connector is executed locally by the lotus/boost
each time a proposal is received.

token.title: CIDgravity connector key
token.subtitle: Add this api key to the CIDgravity connector deployed on the miner

customMessage.title: Custom message
customMessage.info: This message will be sent to the client whenever a deal is rejected.
customMessage.placeholder: For any questions or special pricing, please contact me on Slack

onUpdateMaintenanceMode.enabled: Maintenance mode has been enabled, all deals will now be rejected.

success.onUpdateCustomMessage: The custom message has been saved.
success.onUpdateFriendlyName: The miner nickname has been updated.
success.onUpdateStartEpochSealingBuffer: The start epoch sealing buffer has been updated.

error.onUpdateRateLimits: An error occurred updating settings, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onUpdateMaintenanceMode: An error occurred updating maintenance mode, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onUpdateCustomMessage: An error occurred updating custom message, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onUpdateFriendlyName: An error occurred updating the miner nickname, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onRegenerateConnectorToken: An error occurred generating a new token, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onUpdateStartEpochSealingBuffer: An error occurred updating your start epoch sealing buffer setting, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.

error.generic: An error occurred retrieving account details, Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
